channel.description: Recent content in seed length on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsMYB4a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: TEA003515.1 Gene Symbol: CsMYB4a Gene Name: R2R3-MYB Sg4 member from Camellia sinensis Genome: Species: Camellia sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsMYB4a works synergistically with CsIAA4 and participates in regulation of the auxin pathway in stamen.

item.title: FtbHLH165
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FtPinG0201231100 Gene Symbol: FtbHLH165 Gene Name: Genome: reference genome(https://www.

item.title: GhCIPK6a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhCIPK6a Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: GhCIPK6a increases salt tolerance in transgenic upland cotton by involving in ROS scavenging and MAPK signaling pathways.

item.title: GhKRP6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D11G206800 Gene Symbol: GhKRP6 Gene Name: Genome: G.

item.title: GhPAS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gh_D12G0607 Gene Symbol: GhPAS1 Gene Name: PAGODA1 SUPPRESSOR 1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: The bHLH transcription factor GhPAS1 mediates BR signaling to regulate plant development and architecture in cotton.

item.title: GhSusA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GhSusA1 Gene Name: sucrose synthase1 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of GhSusA1 increases plant biomass and improves cotton fiber yield and quality.

item.title: GmPDAT
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.13g108100 Gene Symbol: GmPDAT Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a4_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: The candidate gene, GmPDAT, had higher expressional levels in high-oil and large-seed accessions than in low-oil and small-seed accessions.

item.title: MsDIUP1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MsDIUP1 Gene Name: Medicago sativa DROUGHT-INDUCED UNKNOWN PROTEIN 1 Genome: whole genome sequencing and assembly of Medicago sativa Species: Medicago sativa Functional Descriptions: Taken together, these results reveal a positive role for MsDIUP1 in regulating drought.

item.title: PrCYP707A1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCYP707A1 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A1 Genome: Species: Phelipanche ramosa Functional Descriptions: PrCYP707A1, an ABA catabolic gene, is a key component of Phelipanche ramosa seed germination in response to the strigolactone analogue GR24.

item.title: PrCYP707A2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PrCYP707A2 Gene Name: ABA 8’-hydroxylase CYP707A2 Genome: Species: Phelipanche ramosa Functional Descriptions: PrCYP707A1, an ABA catabolic gene, is a key component of Phelipanche ramosa seed germination in response to the strigolactone analogue GR24.

item.title: SbSOS1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SbSOS1 Gene Name: salt overly sensitive 1 Genome: Species: Salicornia brachiata Functional Descriptions: The SbSOS1 gene from the extreme halophyte Salicornia brachiata enhances Na+loading in xylem and confers salt tolerance in transgenic tobacco.
